body.name: Bidet Toilet Seat Bumper for Bidet Attachment with Strong Adhesive White 4PACK
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 8 hrs 46 mins
features: Bidet Mate: perfect part attachment for the bidet which cause a gap between toilet and seat.
Material: ABS plastic body and TPE on the bottom, durable and sturdy, provides a great buffering and protect your toilet seat well
Toilet seat bumper measurement: L 5 cm/ 1.97in, W 2 cm/ 0.79in, H 1.7 cm/ 0.67in, the standard size fits for most toilet seat.
Simple Installation: Clean toilet seat ring, keep dry, tear adhesive strip off, stick bumper to toilet seat ring, press hard to ensure firm adhesion
Note: Please keep the toilet seat rings clean and dry before install and during use, Make you put them in the right place the first time.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 15, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Not Terrible, just not very good
reviews.reviewText: As usual for so many products made in China ans use double stick tape, the tape in this product is a lot worse than useless. The glue seems to be very sticky. Ithink it has great affinity to human fingers.When used to attach two items made of plastic, the glue will slowly detach itself. It will still feel dticky to our fingers but to the target it will not adhere.There is an additional problem; this particular product is a bumper, spacer, or 'foot' attached to a toilet seat.Without getting into excessively great details, the broduct experiences the weight of an adult American person, who also tends to move a little while on the seat. This means tha there is a terrific pressure on the bumper, and it suffers sheer loads as well. These conditions literally peel the bumper, or twist it apart.I would recommend at least two small screws to be added.

reviews.reviewText: I needed to replace the original risers on my toilet seat for my bidet. These work great, are a little higher than the originals which I needed and stick better.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Yes, this is what you need
reviews.reviewText: About a year ago I installed an inexpensive bidet attachment to our old toilet. Like many similar units, these install below the existing toilet set using the same bolts. While it works well, it has the side effect of lifting the back of the toilet seat about 3/8", so that the seat no longer sits on any of its existing bumpers, but tilts forward to rest on the front of the toilet itself. The result is an unstable seat.These bumpers are what is needed, and should have been included with bidet attachment itself. As you can see from the photos, they lift the seat into a level position and restore it to the stability it had before. I was concerned that they would not stick to this old wooden toilet seat. But I carefully cleaned the attachment points with alcohol and held each bumper tightly for 30 seconds after applying it. So far so good.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars FALLS OFF WITHIN A FEW DAYS, RENDERING THE BUMPERS WORTHLESS
reviews.reviewText: Installation is as easy as it gets, but then it all goes downhill from there. After the first day, you'll start finding the bumpers inside your toilet bowl wondering what went wrong? Too bad this company already has your money and now you can't return the item because it's in your trash covered in toilet water (if you're lucky!). Avoid like the plague as you are just throwing money in the trash if you purchase this item.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This works great with the Luxe Bidet NEO 120. Taking advantage of this product to write this review, actually

reviews.reviewTitle: Me llego en una bolsa de aliexpress
slightly too high, but not the worst. The adhesive works fine. you just need more than 30sec
reviews.reviewText: a bit too tall for my bidet, but it's not a big deal for the price. I didn't expect it to be perfect. some people complained about the adhesive. I agree that it's not the best, but it's not that bad. I just didn't trust "hold it for 30 seconds". I applied the bumper, and used the toilet for 15min or so. My body weight and longer pressure application did the magic trick, and they seem to be doing fine.
Excellent pairing with a Luxe Neo 320s to keep your toilet seat level. Make sure you follow the instructions for best result
